api/CG.Secrets.Azure.Repositories.Option.title: Namespace CG.Secrets.Azure.Repositories.Options
api/CG.Secrets.Azure.Repositories.Option.keywords: Namespace CG.Secrets.Azure.Repositories.Options Classes ChainedTokenLoginOptions This class represents options for the chained token approach to connecting to Azure. ClientSecretLoginOptions This class represents options for the client secret approach to connecting to Azure. DefaultAzureLoginOptions This class represents options for the default Azure approach to connecting to Azure. EnvironmentLoginOptions This class represents options for the environment approach to connecting to Azure. LoginOptions This class represents configuration options for an Azure login. SecretRepositoryOptions This class represents configuration options for the SecretRepository class. VisualStudioCodeLoginOptions This class represents options for the VisualStudioCode approach to connecting to Azure. VisualStudioLoginOptions This class represents options for the VisualStudio approach to connecting to Azure.
